channel.title: site on a neuro[log]
channel.description: Recent content in site on a neuro[log]

item.title: Added About Page
item.description: I’ve added an About page. I’ve just added an “about” page on the top menu. I know I haven’t written anything here yet of value, but it will come. I did write an absolute rant about Facebook yesterday but I have yet to post it because it is rather harsh. My intention is to finalize it and then post it to Facebook for everyone to see. But we’ll see if I really feel like yelling at all the blind sheep who continue to use that place.
